english_example_sentence: Friends, you lifted that big table without difficulty.
russian_example_sentence: Друзья, вы без труда подняли тот большой стол.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşlar, siz o büyük masayı zorlanmadan kaldırdınız.
